page.title: 15A MOTHER'S DAY
page.content: First my mum wakes up and gets out of bed at about 8a.m. and then she goes into the frontroom and we are normally already up and watching{T.V. A.M.}She gets herself a{coffee}and gets us one as well.Then my Mum sends us to dress because she is already dressed.Then she sends Jon and I to school.Mum does not have{breakfast}but she gives Kate some{Frosties}which is a breakfast cereal.Then she does the cleaning up using an{electric hoover}and the washing up.By the time she has done it all she has to cook the{dinner}for my Dad and Uncle Colin,who come home at 1p.m.Dad and Uncle Colin work on a farm nearby.After{dinner}Mum washes up the dishes.Then she can relax by watching T.V.At 4p.m. we come home from school and at 4.30p.m. she makes tea.At 5p.m. Dad comes home and then we have{tea}and watch T.V. until 8.30.
